channel.title: Who also have very bad days?
channel.description:
Today was TERRIBLE for me.
1. I didn't know if i had to take my bicycle to school, the teacher wasn't clear and i almost had to cry (don't say WTF, i'm just 11 years old and it is just my first week on my secondary school)
2. Guess what? I had to take it. I had to sit behind someone and then half the way PATS, i fell on the ground, hard, on my knees.
3. We came back at school, everything was great, so this point no problem.
4. The pause was gone HORRIBLE. Everything was like messed up, lost at wich local i had to go, then, gladly, i could find someone who is in my class.
5. I lost my book, i was sarching everywhere, crying :'(, i had to go back to my school, nothing found =S.
Well, that was just one HORRIBLE day. Also somebody who had very bad days?

item.title: Who also have very bad days?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

i didn’t do it each time cause i don’t wanna fuckin end up in hell, there ain’t no tellin’ ya kno.

Read full topic

item.title: Who also have very bad days?
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

Today when I was walking down the hallway at school i accidentally stepped on the back of some girls flip flop. I said sorry and ran away. I have gym with her every day and I am afraid she might like trip me or something when I am least expecting it just to get back at me.

Read full topic

item.title: Who also have very bad days?
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

Yea I’ve almost went /suicide a couple times. I got over it though. Now I just don’t give a fuck. I live to live and do what I like to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Who also have very bad days?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Javafire:

I’ve almost killed myself on several occasions, does that count as depression?

It can be you’re depress, but it also might not mean you have depression, you can try to kill your self because some huge event happened, but unless you continue to be in that state of mind your not depressed, depression continues it doesn’t just stop, Ive had thoughts about killing my self and killing other people, but I just think it through and, and think of what would be if I did such a thing, then a few hours later I am better.

Read full topic

item.title: Who also have very bad days?
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:36, topic:357826”][quote author=Word Life link=topic=454337.msg3328155#msg3328155 date=1283266236]

I have depression.

That’s what 100% of the people have, some are just better at handling it than others.
[/quote]

No, just no, not everyone has depression, just because your sad doesn’t mean it is depression its called an emotion for a reason, depression is when your over come with sadness, emptiness, etc, it is more then just being sad for a few hours to a few days, depression is 27/7 365 days., it will never go away it is always with you. You don’t just say I am depressed when your sad, when your depressed you’re more then just sad more then just not loving life for a little while, it keeps going and going until something finally gives.

A bad day for me is when my family members are having bad days.[/quote]

Every one has felt depression, which is why I said that. I did word it wrong, I don’t mean every one actually does have it.

Read full topic
item.source: Who also have very bad days?

item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

SilentCJ:

Why did I find the rattlesnake eating your brother’s hamster hilarious?

because it was, sorta my mom screamed my brother cried, but at the end it was just another fuckin rat.

item.title: Who also have very bad days?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Word Life, post:29, topic:357826”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=454337.msg3328148#msg3328148 date=1283265640]
I have depression.
[/quote]

That’s what 100% of the people have, some are just better at handling it than others.[/quote]

No, just no, not everyone has depression, just because your sad doesn’t mean it is depression its called an emotion for a reason, depression is when your over come with sadness, emptiness, etc, it is more then just being sad for a few hours to a few days, depression is 27/7 365 days., it will never go away it is always with you. You don’t just say I am depressed when your sad, when your depressed you’re more then just sad more then just not loving life for a little while, it keeps going and going until something finally gives.

A bad day for me is when my family members are having bad days.

Read full topic
item.source: Who also have very bad days?

item.title: Who also have very bad days?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:32, topic:357826”]My bad day:

  1. A friend of mine hit me with a metal pipe over a lost pharmacy gift card that i truly had nothing to do with.
  2. that same day at 3am at night my dad kicks me out of the house because i changed my password to the computer login (i am not kidding).
  3. This idiot puts tequila in lemonade at a party and we didn’t know about it and so i had so much fuckin lemonade i was drunk when i came home and threw up all night.
  4. A friend of mine tricked me into huffing wasabi sauce.
  5. a rattlesnake was found in our garage and it ate my brother’s hamster.
  6. We found our lost cat’s bones and fur in a ravine beside our house (we knew it was ours cause’ of the collar we found in the remains).
  7. Some idiot called the cops on me cause’ i wasn’t in school, AT 5 FUCKIN PM IN THE EVENING.

that all happend within the relm of 5 or six days last week. in that order.

i think i win :|[/quote]

That last one cracked me up.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

My bad day:

  1. A friend of mine hit me with a metal pipe over a lost pharmacy gift card that i truly had nothing to do with.
  2. that same day at 3am at night my dad kicks me out of the house because i changed my password to the computer login (i am not kidding).
  3. This idiot puts tequila in lemonade at a party and we didn’t know about it and so i had so much fuckin lemonade i was drunk when i came home and threw up all night.
  4. A friend of mine tricked me into huffing wasabi sauce.
  5. a rattlesnake was found in our garage and it ate my brother’s hamster.
  6. We found our lost cat’s bones and fur in a ravine beside our house (we knew it was ours cause’ of the collar we found in the remains).
  7. Some idiot called the cops on me cause’ i wasn’t in school, AT 5 FUCKIN PM IN THE EVENING.

that all happend within the relm of 5 or six days last week. in that order.

i think i win
